function.name: checkOpen
function.description: Check if the shop is currently open for business. Returns opening status and hours.

function.name: getCallerInfo
function.description: Silently retrieve caller's phone number from call context. Use at start of call.

function.name: startItemConfiguration
function.description: Start configuring a new menu item. Call this when customer mentions an item.

category.description: Item category: kebabs, hsp, chips, drinks, gozleme, sweets, extras, sauce_tubs

name.description: Specific item name if known (e.g., 'Chicken Kebab', 'Lamb HSP')

function.name: setItemProperty
function.description: Set a property on the item currently being configured (size, protein, salads, sauces, extras, etc.)

value.description: Value to set. Can be string, array, boolean, or number depending on field.

function.name: addItemToCart
function.description: Add the fully configured item to cart. Automatically detects combo opportunities.

function.name: getCartState
function.description: Get current cart contents and state.

function.name: removeCartItem
function.description: Remove an item from the cart by index. Use getCartState first to see cart items and their indexes (0-based).

itemIndex.description: Zero-based index of item to remove (0 for first item, 1 for second, etc.)

function.name: editCartItem
function.description: Edit an existing cart item's properties (salads, sauces, extras, cheese, salt_type, quantity). Cannot change size or protein - remove and re-add instead.

itemIndex.description: Zero-based index of item to edit

field.description: Field to edit: salads, sauces, extras, cheese, salt_type, quantity

function.name: clearCart
function.description: Clear all items from cart. Use when customer wants to start over.

function.name: convertItemsToMeals
function.description: Convert kebabs in cart to meals (kebab + chips + drink). Can convert all kebabs or specific items by index. Use when customer says 'make them all meals' or 'upgrade to meals'.

itemIndices.description: Optional: specific cart item indices to convert (0-based). If not provided, converts ALL kebabs in cart.

drinkBrand.description: Drink choice for the meal: coke, sprite, fanta, etc. Default: coke

chipsSize.description: Chips size: small or large. Default: small

chipsSalt.description: Salt type for chips: chicken, plain, or seasoned. Default: chicken

function.name: modifyCartItem
function.description: Modify any property of an existing cart item including size, protein, salads, sauces, etc. Unlike editCartItem, this can change ANY field.

itemIndex.description: Zero-based index of item to modify

modifications.description: Object containing fields to modify and their new values. Example: {"salads": ["tomato", "lettuce"], "sauces": ["garlic"], "size": "large"}

function.name: getDetailedCart
function.description: Get detailed human-readable cart with descriptions and modifiers for each item. Better than getCartState for reviewing order with customer.

function.name: clearSession
function.description: Reset entire session (cart, config, state). Use for testing or complete restart.

function.name: priceCart
function.description: Calculate total price for all items in cart with detailed breakdown.

function.name: estimateReadyTime
function.description: Estimate when order will be ready for pickup based on current queue.

requestedTime.description: Optional: Customer's requested time (e.g., 'in 30 minutes', '6 PM')

function.name: createOrder
function.description: Create and save the final order to database.

readyAtIso.description: ISO timestamp when order will be ready (from estimateReadyTime)

function.name: endCall
function.description: End the phone call gracefully after order completion.
